deep_winter.name: Deep Winter
deep_winter.description: Dominant: Deep. Secondary: Cool. You are high contrast and dramatic. You flow into Autumn, so you can handle some darker neutral warmth.
deep_winter.contrast_strategy: High Contrast. Pair light and dark together (e.g., Black & White).

cool_winter.name: Cool Winter (True Winter)
cool_winter.description: Dominant: Cool. Secondary: Deep. You are the 'classic' winter. No warm tones exist in your features. You shine in icy and sharp colors.
cool_winter.contrast_strategy: High Contrast. Use sharp, distinct blocks of color.

clear_winter.name: Clear Winter (Bright Winter)
clear_winter.description: Dominant: Clear/Bright. Secondary: Cool. You have sparkling eyes and glowing skin. You can wear neon-adjacent colors better than anyone.
clear_winter.contrast_strategy: Maximum Contrast. Bright colors against black or white.

deep_autumn.name: Deep Autumn
deep_autumn.description: Dominant: Deep. Secondary: Warm. You are dark and rich. You flow into Winter, but have a golden glow. You need intense saturation.

warm_autumn.name: Warm Autumn (True Autumn)
warm_autumn.description: Dominant: Warm. Secondary: Muted. You are the essence of a forest in October. Golden, pumpkin, and leafy tones suit you best.
warm_autumn.contrast_strategy: Low Contrast. Monochromatic warm looks are great.

soft_autumn.name: Soft Autumn
soft_autumn.description: Dominant: Muted. Secondary: Warm. You flow into Summer. Your colors are desaturated and earthy, like a foggy morning.

light_spring.name: Light Spring
light_spring.description: Dominant: Light. Secondary: Warm. You look delicate and fresh. You flow into Summer but keep that peachy warmth.
light_spring.contrast_strategy: Low Contrast. Keep everything light and airy.

warm_spring.name: Warm Spring (True Spring)
warm_spring.description: Dominant: Warm. Secondary: Clear. You look like a fruit basket. Fresh, vivid, and yellow-based colors make you shine.

clear_spring.name: Clear Spring (Bright Spring)
clear_spring.description: Dominant: Clear/Bright. Secondary: Warm. You flow into Winter. You need bright colors but with a warm twist.
clear_spring.contrast_strategy: High Contrast. Bright pops of color.

light_summer.name: Light Summer
light_summer.description: Dominant: Light. Secondary: Cool. You look ethereal. You flow into Spring but need blue-based pinks, not orange-based.

cool_summer.name: Cool Summer (True Summer)
cool_summer.description: Dominant: Cool. Secondary: Muted. You are the 'classic' summer. Think rose gardens and water. No warmth allowed.

soft_summer.name: Soft Summer
soft_summer.description: Dominant: Muted. Secondary: Cool. You flow into Autumn. Your colors are complex and greyed-out. Very sophisticated.
soft_summer.contrast_strategy: Low to Medium Contrast. Monochrome cool looks.
